post_title: FS: Lot of 42 T206 w/ Joss Portrait & Higher Grade Commons *ALL SOLD*
post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. Nice assortment with several mid-to-higher grade cards, tougher backs, and HOFers.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS SOLD**
I will take Lajoie if available. LMK. Thanks
Bump for a list update and price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
I'll take Donlin.
PM sent.
Ben
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
